item.title: Lower Lobe Cargo A/C Trim Modulating Valve(s)

remarks.para: May be inoperative provided associated Lower Cargo Trim Shutoff Valve is secured closed.

note.para: The following EICAS message(s) may be displayed:
Trim air is not available to the conditioned air supplied to the compartment.

numlitem.para: Carriage of animals and perishables in associated lower cargo compartment is prohibited.

placard.para: Placard associated Lower Lobe Temp selector "TRIM AIR INOP". Enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.

numlitem.para: To secure Lower Lobe FWD Cargo A/C Trim Shutoff Valve closed:
Open LOWER FORWARD CARGO AIR COND VLVS and LOWER AFT CARGO AIR COND VLVS circuit breakers on the P414 panel.
For Fwd Cargo Trim Air Shutoff Valve, remove the AFT right air conditioning equipment bay panel 192MR to access valve (STA 1240, WL 79, RBL 104).
Manually position valve in the closed position. Remove, cap, and stow valve electrical connector.
Open LOWER FORWARD CARGO AIR COND VLVS and LOWER AFT CARGO AIR COND VLVS circuit breakers on the P414 panel.
In the cockpit the Stats message ZONE TEMP may remain displayed.
To secure Lower Lobe AFT Cargo A/C Trim Shutoff Valve closed:
Open LOWER FORWARD CARGO AIR COND VLVS and LOWER AFT CARGO COND VLVS circuit breakers on the P414 panel.
For AFT Cargo Trim Air Shutoff Valve, locate valve in right body landing gear wheel well on inboard bulkhead (STA 1435, WL 140, RBL 7).
Manually position valve in closed position. Remove, cap, and stow valve electrical connector.
Close LOWER FORWARD CARGO AIR COND VLVS and LOWER AFT CARGO AIR COND VLVS circuit breakers on the P414 panel.
In the cockpit the Status message ZONE TEMP may remain displayed.
